did.head: DESCRIPTIVE SUMMARY
did.unittitle: Stoppages in the Cloak and Suit Industry Transcript on Microfilm, 1926

origination.label: Creator:
origination.corpname: International Ladies' Garment Workers' Union. Local 1 (New York, N.Y.)

did.repository: Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives, Cornell University Library
did.abstract: This microfilm includes information about stoppages in the Cloak and Suit Industry dated 1883 through 1926.
